mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo}-1)*10 + 1 AND (#{pageNo})*10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD
SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}

INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME ,MODIFIER ,MODIFIED_TIME ) VALUES (#{boardType} ,(SELECT NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BOARD_NUM)+1),1) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}) ,#{boardTitle} ,#{boardComment} ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) ,'SYSTEM' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) )

SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TYPE ,BOARD_NUM ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_COMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE IN ('${sArr}') ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo}-1)*10 + 1 AND (#{pageNo})*10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{string}
SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_TYPE , CODE_NAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN COM_CODE C ON B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CODE_ID ORDER BY BOARD_TYPE
